com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender

Class BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.boyanstoynov.littlebigspender.BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - RealmObject data item
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountsAdapter.AccountViewHolder, AccountsAdapter.CryptoViewHolder, CategoriesAdapter.CategoryViewHolder, RecurringAdapter.CryptoRecurringViewHolder, RecurringAdapter.RecurringViewHolder, TransactionsAdapter.CryptoTransactionViewHolder, TransactionsAdapter.TransactionViewHolder
    Enclosing class:
    BaseRecyclerAdapter<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>

    public abstract static class BaseRecyclerAdapter.ViewHolder<E extends io.realm.RealmObject>
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    Base ViewHolder inner static class which stores the item that populates it and binds ButterKnife. It also responds to clicks on the View which show and hide the edit and delete buttons. Upon button press the listener registered with the ViewHolder is notified. Subclasses need to provide an implementation of the presentation and provide the ID of the layout that will be used.

      • setItemPresentation

        protected abstract void setItemPresentation(E item)
        Sets the presentation of the data for this ViewHolder. Subclasses need to provide their own implementations according to the model they are bound to. This method is called after an item is bound.
